content.description: Small pockets surround a seam.  Just left of the wide crack/dihedral separating prow rock and chain rock.

Climb the blunt arete on the NW corner of Chain Rock.  An SDS can be added for a couple extra moves and a bonus point.  A bit dirty at the top but positive holds for both hands and feet will keep you from sketching out.
content.protection: One or two crashpads is plenty.

content.description: Aesthetic line, look for a baseball-sized pocket about 7' off the ground and a big horizontal hueco / edge about 4' higher and 2-3' right, and another similar feature 2-3' up and left. Big reaches, big holds. Fun top-out. Best to go for a left hand fingerlock above last good hueco / edge, and then right hand mantle to top out.

Around the corner from all the activity in the cave complex of Chain Rock is the sheer North Face.  Working up to a crack mid height might be the crux, then a satisfying couple of long reaches to horizontals gets one to the top out.  Slightly overhanging to get the blood warmed up.

This route stays in shade a long, long time and can be good when hiding from the summer sun.
content.location: Find the Spaceship from the Main Carter lake trail.  Northeast from here is Chain Rock with its gaping cave and beautiful V-Book.  Hiding to the north of the cave area, to the left of the Chain Male prow, is the route.

content.description:
From '

Colorado Bouldering, Front Range

' by Phillip Benningfield and Matt Samet:

"Climb the crack in the cave utilizing stems."

We started this route in the jug on the right, moved up and left into the roof crack, and followed the crack out and to top-out.
content.location: After the top-out, walk right and downclimb a short slot to a couple blocks.

content.description: This climbs starts on the outside, left of the arete that forms the the right side of the cave.  The crux comes extremely quick on this one and is over once you have your hands and feet established up and right on the face, thus it might feel hard for the grade.  The rest of the climb is enjoyable and solid nubbin and edging up the face and over the top (but don't fall from up high).
content.protection: Pad and spotter nice but not necessary

content.description: Stem up high into the cave, and then jam your hands into the crack on the left corner of the cave roof out and over, gain a chickenhead like block, and finish.
